#########################################
# HD30501 - http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-id?NbIdent=1&submit=submit+id&Ident=HD30501

Spectral type :   K2V   (http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-ref?bibcode=2006AJ....132..161G)

HD30501-b  Mass    89.6 Mjup
           Msini   62.3 Mjup


age = ~5



#########################################
# HD211847 - http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-basic?Ident=HD+211847+&submit=SIMBAD+search
http://exoplanet.eu/catalog/hd_211847_b/
spec type : G5V  (http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-ref?bibcode=1978MSS...C02....0H)

Mass = 155 MJ   https://arxiv.org/pdf/1701.05664.pdf 2017    Face on binary
msini 19.20
This is a lowmass star not a brown dwarf.
i = 0.07

salhmann age = 0.1 -6.0

#########################################

# HD4747 - http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-id?Ident=HD+4747
http://exoplanet.eu/catalog/hd_4747_b/
Spec type : G8/K0V

m = 60.2±3.3MJup) and orbit (e = 0.740±0.002)    https://arxiv.org/pdf/1604.00398.pdf

"Interpolating the theoretical cooling curves from Baraffe et al. (2003), we find a model-dependent mass of
m_model= M 72+3−13 MJup and Teff≈1700±100 K, assuming coevolution between the companion and host star."

age salhmann  = 0.1 - 7.3


#########################################
# HD202206  -  http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-id?Ident=HD+202206
As of May 2017 this is a "low-inclination, nearly face-on G8V + M6V binary orbited
by a brown dwarf". https://arxiv.org/pdf/1705.00659.pdf    May 2017 !!!!!!!!!  Need to reanalyze the rv separation.

Spec type host: G6V

RV minimum mass
Mbsini=17.4MJup
Mcsini=2.44MJup
.
Measured masses
HD202206B  - 93.6 Mj
HD202206c  - 17.6 Mj


Age = 5.6  Wikipedia

Need to manually get BD flux ratio the old way. script to do it offline given the mag and band


############################################


# HD168443  -  http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-id?protocol=html&Ident=HD%20168443
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HD_168443

https://arxiv.org/pdf/1109.5166.pdf
SpT    = G6V

2 planets /brown dwarfs
MIsini b = 7.659
msini c = 17.193


age = 9.8 +/- 1  exoplanet.eu
#########################################
# HD167665   http://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1086/519066/meta;jsessionid=4CA02DF0181B83F4CE1C2C0EB20F353B.c2.iopscience.cld.iop.org
http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-id?Ident=HD%20167665

F9V    or G0 V     (F9VFe-0.8CH-0.4)

msini 50.3 MJup

age from sahlmann   0.7-3.6 gyr

flux ratio 2e-3 to 2e-5 from age.

#########################################
# HD162020   http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-id?Ident=HD%20162020&NbIdent=1&Radius=2&Radius.unit=arcmin&submit=submit+id

M2sini = 14.4 MJ
SpT = K3V

sahlman paper.
Undry 2002

Age  	0.76 Gyr  from exoplanet.eu

flux ratio K =  7e-6
